reviewText: We really enjoyed this movie. If anyone likes the Gidget then I reccommend this movie to them. As far as I am concerned Sally Field makes this movie and with the price being so right it is a fun one to share with the family.

reviewText: Much better than today...was another time and place. Ah, the sweetness of girls from a day gone by. My friends and I wanna know where you can find these kind of girls. While it's true "gidget" was just a show, there were still plenty of girls like her back then...put these "hot" chicks today in a brown paper bag, shake 'em up...all the same!  Nothing special about any of 'em! This video and her other one are VERY good...she's cute, clever, resourceful, independant, lovable! get's herself in and out of trouble herself, always in episodes. I recommend every young girl to purchase at least one of them, sit down, watch and really see a "model" example of what both parent's and guy's (really dig in a chick and)...can be proud of!
Title: N/A

reviewText: 3 episodes of Sally Field's short-lived but critically-acclaimed sitcom.In the first episode, Gidget gives Larue a makeover but Gidget's dad is the one who's attracted, or so eveyone thinks.  Hilarious farce comedy!In the second episode, Richard Dreyfuss makes an appearance as a high school nerd who's confidence is boosted by Gidget only to have him dump her before she can sympathetically dump him.In the third (and the best of the 3) episode, Gidget meets with Jeff's parents but misunderstandings occur.  I won't tell you anymore.  You'll have to watch it and laugh your head off for yourself.Great episodes.  Great acting.  Great show.  Great purchase...if you buy it.
summary: Hilarious misunderstandings on these Gidget episodes
Title: N/A

reviewText: These were cute TV shows.  I enjoy Sally Field as Gidget.  This is a good video to watch when there's nothing else to do, and you don't want to be bogged down with a full-length movie.
summary: Brings back old memories with a smile

reviewText: The first "Gidget" movie is alot of fun to watch: not only is there surfing (okay,alot of it is fake) but the fact that there's a girl in it, "a girl, a midget, a Gidget", is fantastic...Surfing is still a very male dominate sport and it shouldn't be.The first "Gidget" movie is, in my opinion, a classic!
